channel.title: Devolution
channel.description: Does Anyone use this as their base or is currently developing from a version of devolution (based off of dodian) (most common is v7) I was thinking of using this as my base and just wanted to know if anyone ele uses it or is developing onto it?

item.title: Devolution
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:11, topic:435810”][quote author=Level 120 Dungeoneering link=topic=538532.msg3941301#msg3941301 date=1331429677]

sounds and looks like winterlove with more shit slapped on

Don’t hate on it. It’s better than most servers out today and it’s was released right after dodian.

it’s the continuation of a piss-poor design that continues to rear its ugly head even 6 years after its initial release, so naturally anyone with a clue will ‘hate on it’.

dodian can nuck my suts.

I see what you did there.
[/quote]

You’ve got quite a name there.[/quote]
Its a long one, ain’t it.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I’ve used devolution before, I suggest using it if your new to private servers. It’s quite a fun source to play around with. I wouldn’t make anything serious with it though.

Read full topic
